name: Gun Mage
description:
Gun Mage is a fast-paced, action-packed, 2D Combat-Platformer game where you only have one bullet in the chamber of your weapon. And you’re gonna have to make it count.

Challenge your friends online (with the steam remote together) or on the comfort of your couch in an epic gun duel to the death ! Jump, shoot, reflect and bluff your way up to the top and become the ultimate Gun Mage !
